Subject: FW: Testimony to Support the SoCalGas Settlement Agreement
text: Attached please find the latest draft of Rick Counihan's testimony, as
drafted by John Leslie. John asked me to distribute it as his email system is
currently battling a virus. (I am using the distribution list that Brian
Cherry used to distribute the Lad Lorenz draft testimony, which I believe
Please call John with any comments you may have on the draft. His number is
619-699-2536. He cannot currently be reached by email.
Managing Director of SPURR and CUB
